commands.name: az mobile-network sim create
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network sim create --international-msi
                             --name
                             --resource-group
                             --sim-group-name
                             [--authentication-key]
                             [--device-type]
                             [--icc-id]
                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                             [--operator-key-code]
                             [--sim-policy]
                             [--static-ip-config]
examples: az mobile-network sim create -g rg --sim-group-name sim-group-name -n sim-name --international-msi 0000000000 --operator-key-code 00000000000000000000000000000000 --authentication-key 00000000000000000000000000000000

commands.name: az mobile-network sim delete
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network sim delete [--ids]
                             [--name]
                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                             [--resource-group]
                             [--sim-group-name]
                             [--subscription]
                             [--yes]
examples: az mobile-network sim delete -g rg -n sim-name --sim-group-name sim-group-name -y

commands.name: az mobile-network sim list
commands.summary: List all the SIMs in a SIM group.
examples: az mobile-network sim list -g rg --sim-group-name sim-group-name

commands.name: az mobile-network sim show
commands.summary: Get information about the specified SIM.
examples: az mobile-network sim show -g rg -n sim-name --sim-group-name sim-group-name

commands.name: az mobile-network sim wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
